annotations.description: Another drink from the Brilliant Mind Of Micah Melton of the Aviary in Chicago! The name of this one really speaks for itself, no surprises here, this low ab...
annotations.title: Key Lime Mimosa A Christmas Brunch staple from the Aviary in Chicago

textContent:
3oz (90ml) Prosecco
1oz (30ml) Milk Stock
.75oz (22.5ml) Licor 43
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
Grated Graham Cracker Garnish

Add prosecco to glass. Shake other ingredients. 
Slowly strain into prosecco. Garnish with cracker. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRUGB4Z6nmo
title: Key Lime Mimosa
